dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1365 IH: Ammunition and Firearms Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McHenry introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prevent the reclassification of certain ammunition as armor piercing ammunition.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ammunition and Firearms Protection Act.

section.header: Prevention of reclassification of certain ammunition as armor piercing ammunition
section.text: Section 921(a)(17) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Notwithstanding subparagraph (B), the term armor piercing ammunition does not includeâ€”

clause.text: any M855 (5.56 mm x 45 mm) or SS109 type ammunition; or
any ammunition designed, intended, and marketed for use in a rifle.
